title: Project-Based Information Security Education for Cybersecurity Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Computer Systems and Network Structures, with Foundational Programming Skills
context.additional_context: An information security training course utilizing simulation tools and collaboration platforms in an online environment, involving projects that solve real-world cybersecurity challenges

learning_goals: Information security threat detection and response procedures can be explained through analysis of real cyberattack scenarios.
A system design project can be completed that applies core security technologies such as encryption, access control, and network security.
Ethical considerations and security policy development strategies can be presented during team-based problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
